text: <@UJAPS2K4N> oh my goodness, you are a lifesaver!! thank you so much!!

Originally found this tool through suggestions made by ~others~ a co-worker in response to questions along the same lines as yours. In the event you find yourself doing more email development that requires some level of responsiveness HubSpot’s default layouts don’t support, highly recommend checking it out: <https://mjml.io/>
mjml is amazing for  HTML email templates :fire:

Is anyone experiencing issues with telephone links not opening on the Apple Mail app?

It's a recent issue only with our HubSpot emails where you need to hold the links down for them to be clickable. On other apps, the links open instantly. Have spoken to HubSpot support and no issues with the URLs in our templates. Trying to work out if there's an Apple Mail app change. Thanks :pray:
Are they explicitly-defined telephone links (`<a href="tel:00000000">`), or are you relying on the browser/mail client to detect the phone numbers?
